content: hook and pull tight finish off - use a needle to send yarn tail through your piece to hide it and then cut off what is left of the yarn tail close to close the hole you have left slip_stitch and enlarge loop on hook remove hook and cut yarn leaving a long tail using a needle tread yarn through each stitch in round starting from inside to outside on the next stitch go outside to inside next stitch inside to outside repeating until you have one stitch left skip the last stitch and pull yarn through the loop you left at the start and gently pull to close the hole and tighten up loop © 2019 the fidghty flower llc all rights reserved www thefidgetyflower com jellyfish 3 jellyfish finished size approx 9 across the body yarn colors 1 ball 10 5 oz / 300g bernat blanket brights busy blue a 1 ball 5 3 oz / 150g bernat blanket brights waterslide varg b hook us k 10 5 / 6 5mm other materials safety eyes 15mm polyester fiberfill body top with a round 1 magic_ring with 8 single_crochet place marker round 2 increase in each st around 16 round 3 single_crochet in next st increase repeat around 24 round 4 single_crochet in next 2 sts increase repeat around 32 round 5 single_crochet in next 3 sts increase repeat around 40 round 6 single_crochet in next 4 sts increase repeat around 48 rnds 7-9 single_crochet in each st around round 10 in front loops only 3 half_double_crochet in one st slip_stitch in next st repeat around slip_stitch in next st to fasten_off leave a tail long enough to weave in © 2019 the fidghty flower llc all rights reserved www thefidgetyflower com jellyfish 4 attach eyes to body top between round 6 and 7 about 9 st apart eye placement body bottom with a repeat round 1-6 of body top slip_stitch in next st to fasten_off leave a long tail to sew all the way around the body sew body top and body bottom wrong sides together using the back loops of round 10 of the body top match stiches as you sew around stuff before you finish finish off attach top and back loop of bottom round 10 bottom of body © 2019 the fidghty flower llc all rights reserved www thefidgetyflower com jellyfish 5 tentacles make 10 or more 5 with a and 5 with b chain to desired length between 29 -35 chain 12 and 15 inches long using the single loop side of the chain 3 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 3 single_crochet in each chain to end leave a tail long enough to sew tentacle to body sew 8 tentacles to bottom of body evenly spaced around round 6 i like to center the first one between the eyes sew last two tentacles in the middle of the body bottom finish off ends placement of first 8 tentacles placement of last 2 tentacles
